author: Jeremy Veno
title: Parked car vandalised, set on fire by a group of men in Kuching
description: KUCHING (July 23): A car that was parked in front of a coffee shop at Mile 9 here was vandalised and set on fire by a group of men around 12.10am this morning. The incident was recorded and also shared by netizens on social media, who speculated that the suspects might be the same gang [...]

author: Abbey Maclure
title: Fika North Leeds: Headingley coffee shop set to reopen following refurbishment with exciting additions
description: A popular Leeds coffee shop is set to reopen following a refurbishment, with a new dedicated takeaway hatch.

author: Daniel Walton
title: 'Are you really deaf?' Customer 'left in tears' following Costa experience
description: A coffee lover says she was left in tears after being asked if she was "really deaf" at a Costa Coffee store.

author: Brooke Kato
title: Lana Del Rey seen picking up shift at Waffle House as fans gush: ‘So real’
description: The "Young and Beautiful" crooner wore the chain's signature blue uniform complete with a bright yellow name tag as she took orders and poured patrons' coffee.

author: Megan K. Stack
title: Inside Starbucks’ Dirty War Against Organized Labor
description: As strikes explode across America, the coffee chain’s story holds a lesson on how to fight — and how the bosses fight dirty.

author: Jason Brow
title: Carli Lloyd Says To Keep An Eye On These U.S. Women’s Soccer Stars During The 2023 World Cup (Exclusive)
description: With the Women's World Cup kicking off, Carli Lloyd teams with FanDuel for the 'FanFuel' coffee to help you catch every second. She also shares who on Team USA you should watch.

author: Maia Luem
title: LoHi’s Method Coffee opens second location along Santa Fe Drive
description: Method Coffee Roasters, which has operated in LoHi since 2018, opened its second location this week at 1201 Santa Fe Drive in Lincoln Park. The 1,200-square-foot space was previously home to The Molecule Effect, which also sold coffee.

author: HAMISH MCNEILLY
title: The last meal for Anna Hill: 'This has ruined my life'
description: Anna Hill hasn't eaten a proper meal for almost two years, and would love to drink a simple cup of coffee. Now, the former nurse may go overseas for a crucial operation to restore her oesophagus.

author: Madison Reeve
title: Surveillance footage disproves Kelowna coffee shop owner's assault claims
description: UPDATE 12 p.m.Castanet News has obtained surveillance footage of an altercation between a downtown Kelowna cafe owner and patron on Saturday afternoon. David Dong, owner of the Blenz Coffee inside the Innovation Centre on Doyle Avenue, approached Castanet this week to share claims that he wa...

author: John Plessel
title: Dine 909: Los Tacos Lokos and Rad Coffee expand in the Inland Empire
description: Los Tacos Lokos has opened in north San Bernardino, while Rad Coffee's new coffeehouse is in downtown Riverside.

title: Best coffee machine deals you can buy at Amazon right now, from Nespresso, Sage, De’Longhi and more
